main-page.current: I'm a 4th-year Computer Engineering student at Yildiz Technical University.

projects-page.pcs: Project Coordination Process Control and Mail System
projects-page.pcs-mess-1: I developed this project as part of my Computer Project course.
projects-page.pcs-mess-2: The goal of the project is to develop a web-based system to facilitate the management of Computer Project and Graduation Project courses in the YTU Computer Engineering Department.
projects-page.ekm-mess-1-1: We carried out our project in the Software Development with Agile Approaches class with our instructor
projects-page.ekm-mess-2: Through this project, I gained experience in Agile development using tools like Jira and Miro.

projects-page.drc-mess-1: I completed this project as my internship project.
projects-page.drc-mess-2: I coded a system for a business that handles in-person car rental operations.
projects-page.ma-mess-1: I developed it using Flutter and .NET.
projects-page.ma-mess-2: The purpose of the project is to enable users to communicate completely anonymously and securely by using Curve25519 for encryption and signing.
projects-page.gg-mess-1: We are developing this project as part of our Graduation Project course.
projects-page.gg-mess-2: The purpose of the project is to provide a web-based system that delivers the genre information of the music uploaded by users through a cnn model.
projects-page.og-mess-1: The purpose of the project is to allow users to practice chess by choosing a model with a desired skill level and playing from any chosen position.
projects-page.og-mess-2: Technologies to be used: .Net | Angular | Python
projects-page.sg-mess-1: Under the SKYLAB club, we are developing an IDS and SIEM-based security system as SKYSEC to protect our backend servers.
projects-page.hw-mess-1: As part of the CDTP course, we are developing a system that detects situations such as patient falls or abnormal heart rates and alerts the caregiver.
projects-page.hw-mess-2: I am working on the backend development of this system using .NET.
